name: Mines Sweeper
description:
Welcome to our version of the Minesweeper - a single-player video game. Exercise your strategic and logical thinking, build your math skills while having fun along the way! With million of different clones available, why should you choose our version? We think we were able to bring you a nice clean design, with 3 different levels, optional sound effects, score boards in a tiny download package.

The goal of the game is to uncover all the squares that do not contain mines without being "destroyed" by clicking on a mine, in the shortest time possible!
- Tap the button on top to switch between sweeping and flagging mode
- Tap a square to clear it in sweeping mode
- Tap a square to drop a flag in flagging mode
- Tap a numbered square next to that many flags to clear the rest
- Use menu to select difficulty, control the sound, or check the score
